duckdb.name: DuckDB
duckdb.protocol_description: This directory contains examples showing how to use ADBC to connect {language} applications to DuckDB-compatible systems.
duckdb.source_systems_intro: The examples included here cover the following systems:

flightsql.name: Arrow Flight SQL
flightsql.protocol_description: This directory contains examples showing how to use ADBC to connect {language} applications to systems that support [Arrow Flight SQL](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/format/FlightSql.html).
flightsql.source_systems_intro: Any open source tool or vendor product that implements Arrow Flight SQL should work with the ADBC driver for Flight SQL. The examples included here focus on the following systems:

mysql.name: MySQL
mysql.protocol_description: This directory contains examples showing how to use ADBC to connect {language} applications to MySQL-compatible database systems.
mysql.source_systems_intro: Any open source tool or vendor product that implements the MySQL protocol should work with the ADBC driver for MySQL. The examples included here focus on the following systems:

postgresql.name: PostgreSQL
postgresql.protocol_description: This directory contains examples showing how to use ADBC to connect {language} applications to systems that support [PostgreSQL frontend/backend (wire) protocol](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/protocol.html).
postgresql.source_systems_intro: Any open source tool or vendor product that implements PostgreSQL frontend/backend protocol should work with the ADBC driver for PostgreSQL. The examples included here focus on the following systems:
